Articles.Content:
A standard persist file with different factions stations would be cool

Been thinking about this one. Before we do this, we need some devoted admins to ensure the inevitable immature people don't wreck the whole thing like what I hear happened with the roleplaying before.

Been thinking about this one. Before we do this, we need some devoted admins to ensure the inevitable immature people don't wreck the whole thing like what I hear happened with the roleplaying before.

Keeping the previous copy would be a good idea so there would always be a fallback.

Ok the KIDA fleet is in position.

I've had to heavily strip down a Co-21D as no other ship was close to the correct weight. My force comes to pretty much dead on 250 tons. (252 I think)

Here's the persist: https://www.dropbox.com/s/fpf3fpgrptje6ol/persistent.sfs

I'm using:

4 Firefly fighters

A X-5 Frigate (TDN Vengeance) Wait a Zokesia ship is called that, i'll rename it next turn. :S

A Kapella Light Carrier (TDN Kapella)

A stripped down Co-21D (TDN Deliverance)
Don't fail me now, Kapella!

Well, due to the fact that it seems Sliinty seems to be away for a while, we taking this opportunity to back out of this fight. We do not posess the fighter strength to do any resonable damage without ramming and/or losing our Battlecruiser. Therefore we are going to pull out our Battlecruiser and Destroyers untill we have a properly equippede fighter. We will be back, mark my words, but for now we must think about conserving our limited resources. We do not consider this a loss, but it probably looks bad. And i hate to say it, but our fighters just cannot compete with yours. our capital ships and destroyers are surely superior to yours, but they cannot fight when our fighters are woefully unable to defend them.

BUT REMEMBER! We do not accept defeat! we will return with proper fighters and conquer Dres as our own!
In this RP I shall Lay claim to Gilly As the Tyrene Empire.

Zokesia Currently has the Duna System, after our victory against probe Tek.

And our new fighter weighs 84 tons :I
84 tons isn't a fighter.
In zokesia it is... anyway im trying to make a smaller, lighteer fighter but i cant seem to do it. always comes out massive.
In zokesia missile fires fighter.
Can somebody tell me how this work, how to built those ships and the rules. because im interested.

our capital ships and destroyers are surely superior to yours.

You just keep thinking that...

You just keep thinking that...

dude. we have 18 ton missiles. Each Destroyer carries two of them.
Zekes as a friend you kinda had that coming.

The ships are of the individuals design.Rules are on the original post.

Here's tutorials from a variety of sources
well, you can't win every battle... as long as we protect our empire we are happy.

dude. we have 18 ton missiles. Each Destroyer carries two of them.

Ok didn't know about that secret!

How much do the destroyers weight? Armed that is.

And our fighters are only 4.5 tons fully armed!!! Yours are 80!
lol yeah we tend to overbuild in every way... which makes it hard for us to battle when our fighters don't work (like the burkes)
@Zekes - why not get a fighter design on loan or something?
yeah im beginning to think thats gonna have to be the way to go...
Don't forget you have to use bannons system.

yaaaay i made a ship that's only 30 tons!

The Drekavak carries a single torpedo capable of crippling even the biggest capital ship.

NOW i can fight...

Well, due to the fact that it seems Sliinty seems to be away for a while, we taking this opportunity to back out of this fight. We do not posess the fighter strength to do any resonable damage without ramming and/or losing our Battlecruiser. Therefore we are going to pull out our Battlecruiser and Destroyers untill we have a properly equippede fighter. We will be back, mark my words, but for now we must think about conserving our limited resources. We do not consider this a loss, but it probably looks bad. And i hate to say it, but our fighters just cannot compete with yours. our capital ships and destroyers are surely superior to yours, but they cannot fight when our fighters are woefully unable to defend them.

BUT REMEMBER! We do not accept defeat! we will return with proper fighters and conquer Dres as our own!

Dammit I should have gone onto the forum before doing my go... just spent like 2 hours dealing with apocalag from all the debris, If you must know I fired 2 broadsides at the emperor, the first removed the command section and destroyed its docking port, the second shook apart the missiles in the aft section, I then rammed it, resulting in the complete destruction of the remaining rear section, but the TDN Ash was heavily damaged and on a suborbital trajectory, luckily the RCS was still functioning, so the pilot didnt have to bail out and try to circularise with EVA.

EDIT:

Yeah it seems that having a good fighter platform is important look at the RT hardshell and (no hubris here lol) my L-153, independently developed but actually somewhat similar in design, it's probably a good sort of shape for a fighter to have.

Edited August 7, 2013 by Sliinty
yeah i see my fighters were useless and the capital ships sitting ducks. but now the Drekavak should wreak havoc on enemy fighters.

yeah i see my fighters were useless and the capital ships sitting ducks. but now the Drekavak should wreak havoc on enemy fighters.

Actually I've got to say that your capital ships were some of the toughest ships Ive seen. Though looking through the wreckage I have to say the Emperor was not hugely part count efficient, so many RCS ports and those wide I beams...
